title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.2 - Appeal from chancellor's order by community board or any suspended or removed member
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.2 - Appeal from chancellor's order by community board or any suspended or removed member

State Regulations

Any community board ordered by the chancellor pursuant to
section
2590-l
of the

Education Law to cease conduct or take action, any community board superseded
pursuant to section 2590-l by the chancellor or trustee appointed by him or any
community board or community board member suspended or removed by the
chancellor pursuant to section 2590-l may file an appeal with the city
board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
113.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
